POSTING_JOURNAL.HAS_PREVIOUS_EDITS: Last edit by {{ user }} on {{ date }}
POSTING_JOURNAL.SHOW_FULL_TRANSACTION_RECORDS_HELP: Enabling this option will make this server return all rows in a transaction matching any of the filter values.  It may slow down journal performance slightly.
POSTING_JOURNAL.OUTDATED_DATA_MESSAGE_1: The data displayed may have changed since it was loaded.

ERRORS.CLOSED_FISCAL_YEAR: The fiscal year for this date has already been closed
ERRORS.CREDITED_DEBITED: An account can not be debited and credited on the same transaction line
ERRORS.DEACTIVATED_USER: A transaction was made by a user account that has been deactivated.  Please review this transaction carefully, unlock the user account, and post.
ERRORS.DEB_CRED_NOT_NULL: The debits and credits should not be zero
ERRORS.HAS_TITLE_ACCOUNT_BALANCE: Transaction contains a title account with a balance.  This indicates corrupt data in your database.  To correct this error, contact a system administrator.
ERRORS.LOCKED_ACCOUNT: An accountant has locked one or more accounts used in a transaction.  To correct this error, update the transaction or unlock the periods.
ERRORS.LOCKED_CREDITOR_GROUP_ACCOUNT: These transactions use an account of a locked creditor group and may have been made in error.  To correct this, either modify the transactions or unlock the creditor group.
ERRORS.LOCKED_DEBTOR_GROUP_ACCOUNT: These transactions use an account of a locked debtor group and may have been made in error.  To correct this, either modify the transactions or unlock the debtor group.
ERRORS.LOCKED_PERIOD: An accountant has locked the periods used in these transactions. To correct this error, please unlock the periods in the fiscal year module.
ERRORS.MULTIPLE_CANCELLING: This transaction has been already cancelled and cannot be cancelled twice.
ERRORS.NO_FISCAL_FOR_DATE: There is no fiscal year for this date
ERRORS.SINGLE_LINE_TRANSACTION: A transaction must have two or more lines. To correct this, locate the transaction and add the balancing line.
ERRORS.TRANSACTION_ALREADY_POSTED: Transaction has already been posted and cannot be edited
ERRORS.TRANSACTION_DIFF_DATES: A transaction must have identical dates, yet some transaction contains different dates. Correct this by updating the dates of the affected transactions.
ERRORS.USER_CANNOT_EDIT_POSTED_TRANSACTION: User cannot edit this transaction as it has already been posted
ERRORS.VARIOUS_TRANSACTION_TYPE: Various transaction types for a transaction

WARNINGS.MISSING_ENTITY: Record without entity type and entity ID
WARNINGS.NO_TRANSACTIONS_SELECTED: No transactions selected. You must be in Transaction view to use this tool.
WARNINGS.MULTIPLE_TRANSACTION_EDIT_DISABLED: You have multiple transactions selected. Multiple transaction editing is currently disabled.
WARNINGS.TRIAL_BALANCE_HAS_POSTED_RECORDS: You have selected posted records!  The Trial Balance can only show results of unposted records.

TRIAL_BALANCE.TITLE: Trial Balance
TRIAL_BALANCE.POSTED_TRANSACTIONS: Success!  Posted {{ numRecords }} Transactions to the General Ledger.

POSTING_JOURNAL.TITLE: Journal
